column2: Through Genetic Engineering this child can become a genius.
Through Genetic Engineering this child can become quick of mind.
Through Genetic Engineering this child can become strong.
Through Genetic Engineering this child can become agile.
Through Genetic Engineering this child can become tall.
Through Genetic Engineering we can remove negative traits.
Through Genetic Engineering this child can be adapted to thrive on planets with extremely high gravity, increasing health and strength
Through Genetic Engineering this child can connect to networks with their mind, without the need for any external gadgets or cybernetics
What could go wrong if we spliced some animal genes in?
Through Genetic Engineering we can expand the human lifespan.
